p: There were many investigations publishing active components of bitter melon that support type 2 DM treatment. The important phytochemicals of the plants are steroids, momordicosides (A, B, C, D, E, G, F 1, F 2, I, K, L), acyl glucosyl sterols, fatty acids, amino acids, alkaloids, phenolic compounds, steroidal saponin, vitamins, carbohydrates, and minerals, etc. [ 40, 41, 42, 43, 44, 45, 46, 47, 48].
